title: Learn to swim
creator_credit: Don Bennetts, American Red Cross and United States. Dept. of Agriculture
brief_description: How to teach swimming by developing the pupil’s confidence; demonstrations of such basic strokes as breast stroke, side stroke, back stroke, and the crawl, are included.
